article_title: US reports death of senior Hamas military leader
sentence: Hamas  leader  Marwan  Issa  died  in  an  Israeli  air  strike,  White  House  official  Jake  Sullivan  has  said.

article_title: US reports death of senior Hamas military leader
sentence: As  deputy  military  commander,  Mr  Issa  would  be  Hamas's  most  senior  leader  to  die  since  the  war  began  on  7  October.

article_title: US reports death of senior Hamas military leader
sentence: Israeli  media  sources  have  reported  that  Mr  Issa  was  killed  in  a  strike  on  a  tunnel  complex  under  the  Nuseirat  refugee  camp  in  central  Gaza  last  week.

article_title: US reports death of senior Hamas military leader
sentence: The  European  Union,  which  placed  the  Hamas  leader  on  its  terrorist  blacklist,  linked  him  directly  to  the  7  October  attack  led  by  the  group  which  killed  approximately  1,200  people.

article_title: US reports death of senior Hamas military leader
sentence: The  Israeli  military  has  killed  a  number  of  Hamas's  senior  leaders  since  7  October.

article_title: US reports death of senior Hamas military leader
sentence: Hamas  political  leader  Saleh  al-Arouri  died  in  an  explosion  in  Beirut's  southern  suburb  of  Dahiyeh.

article_title: US reports death of senior Hamas military leader
sentence: More  than  31,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  since  the  war  started  on  7  October,  according  to  the  Hamas-led  health  ministry  in  Gaza.

article_title: US reports death of senior Hamas military leader
sentence: Correction  25th  March:  This  article  previously  stated  that  31,000  Palestinian  civilians  have  been  killed  since  the  start  of  the  war  and  has  been  amended  to  make  clear  that  this  is  the  overall  Palestinian  death  toll.
